text: Anyone else out there with merge rights to `IJulia`? I filed a <https://github.com/JuliaLang/IJulia.jl/pull/946#issuecomment-775416949|PR> 6+ months ago with what I think is an important addition to the API and I'm feeling sort of frustrated that I can't seem to get it reviewed.

elements.text: Anyone else out there with merge rights to
6+ months ago with what I think is an important addition to the API and I'm feeling sort of frustrated that I can't seem to get it reviewed.

text:
Did you bump it? (Posting a comment on the PR so it triggers s notification)

I recommend bumping PRs every 10 days unless the maintainer tells you not to.

As a person maintaining dozens of repos it is helpful to me if things are bumped because it's easy to miss a notification
